sentence.pinyin: Tā de huǒshí bùbǐ wǒ de qiáng
sentence.english: His diet is by no means better than mine
He is no older than you

sentence.pinyin: tā bù bĭ wŏ gèng zhèngdāng
sentence.english: She has no more right to the throne than I
He is no better than he was yesterday

sentence.hanzi: 你 没有 我 高
sentence.english: You’re not as tall as me
He’s not as hard-working as you

sentence.pinyin: Wǒ de fángzǐ méiyǒu nǐ de dà
sentence.english: My house isn’t as big as yours
